situation.title: Beekeepers
situation.meta_description: All adopted measures (ban on the free movement of people, ban on organizing events, etc.) apply to beekeepers without exception.

content.processed:
All adopted measures (ban on the free movement of people, ban on organizing events, etc.) apply to beekeepers without exception.

However, no measures have been taken regarding the breeding itself, so all procedures, processes, and registration remain unchanged.
